containers.name: ID_WITH_PREFIX
entryPoint: while ! [ -f /opt/sd/launch ]; do sleep 1; done; mkdir -p /sd && /opt/sd/launch --api-uri API_URI --store-uri STORE_URI --emitter /opt/sd/emitter --build-timeout SD_BUILD_TIMEOUT BUILD_ID & /opt/sd/logservice --emitter /opt/sd/emitter --api-uri STORE_URI --build BUILD_ID & wait $(jobs -p)
